title: Sadey Pants from Borges Lettering
content:
I made this Script for my little girl, Sadey.

It was just released at [www.letterheadfonts.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20120515180550/http:/www.letterheadfonts.com/ "www.letterheadfonts.com")

Thanks for looking!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20120515180550im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Sadey-Pants_4042.jpg)

Charles Borges de Oliveira

[www.borgeslettering.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20120515180550/http:/www.borgeslettering.com/ "www.borgeslettering.com")
author: Charles_borges_...

comments.content: Lucky little girl! This is very charming and applicable, as the above examples show. Very nice work!

It is essentially monoline Charles... what took you so long :-)

Very SWEEEEET, and the medium/bold is going to be finished when?

Michael

Thanks Chad and Michael,

Probably after I finish my new western font.

:)
